ygData.subject: Re: spell question
ygData.msgSnippet: aye the dmg was reduced.....max total dmg on lv 48
ygData.messageBody:
aye the dmg was reduced.....max total dmg on lv 48 <it doesn't go up after
that> 516....would've been doing around like you said, 550.....it starts out
doing 501, then raises 5 every level until it reaches 516....seems kinda like
a gyp to me...and banish never goes up...it's always max dmg of 585.....what
gives? i thought clerics were supposed to be able to slaughter undead <hey
that's what we do> and yet, druids of the same level can do 600+ i
believe...that's screwed

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
enough ramblings for now (:

Mr. J Daniels wrote:

> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>

> 1 word, Retribution. Dmg at level 44 is about 502. I know a level 50
